title: Textile, 1970-11-1, ca. 1300
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: woven knotted net patterned by embroidery, tie-dyed
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 85 x 90 cm (33 7/16 x 35 7/16 in.)
description: Sheer openwork fabric with embroidery forming diagonal bands containing interlocked shapes. Piece has been tied and dyed reddish brown.
